TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON GPE and PERSON , are NORP nationals who were both born in DATE and live in GPE . They were represented before the Court by Ms K. Moskalenko and Mr M. Rachkovskiy , lawyers practising in GPE .
s , may be summarised as follows .
The applicants are the parents of Mr PERSON , a journalist writing for the PERSON newspaper , who was killed in his office on DATE by a bomb explosion .
On DATE the applicants were granted the victim status in the criminal case concerning their son ’s assassination .

The investigation charged CARDINAL officers of ORG and CARDINAL civilian with intentional murder of Mr GPE . It was alleged that the plot had been designed to put an end to PERSON publications about corruption in ORG . The newspaper and another wounded journalist , but not the applicants , constituted themselves as civil parties in the criminal proceedings .
On DATE ORG of ORG acquitted the defendants of all charges .
On DATE ORG of ORG of the Russian Federation quashed the acquittal and remitted the matter for a new examination by a different formation .
The second trial began on DATE . On DATE ORG of ORG again pronounced an acquittal .
On DATE ORG of ORG upheld the acquittal in the final instance .
